name: steamserv
description: A tool for receiving steam server information in Discord. This is an updated version of a previous build of realSaddy's (which used Node.js). ### Env File ``` TOKEN= MONGO_USERNAME= MONGO_PASSWORD= MONGO_HOST= MONGO_DATABASE= ``` ## License GNU GPLv3 - You may use this code, however, you must disclose you got it from here. This includes publicly attributing it in your Discord bot. ## Contributors realSaddy - Manager, main coder
author: realSaddy
